rightcol.title: Expected Tittle
rightcol.objective: Your personal statement is perhaps the single most important part of you CV. Its aim is to highlight your professional attributes and goals, summarize why someone should consider your application. (80-100 words)

job-description.li-1: - Provide a list of the key achievements you have made in your job
job-description.li-2: - Try to show evidence such as percentage increases or financial figures
job-description.gained-1: - Show that you have the relevant knowledge required to succeed
